item.title: Lacey Chabert Is Going to Disney World for Her Next Hallmark Christmas Movie! Get All the Joy-Filled Details

item.title: Gene Simmons Says Former Kiss Member Ace Frehley's Death Was Due to 'Bad Decisions'
item.description: The founding KISS member died of blunt-trauma injuries to his head due to a fall in October

item.title: Trista Sutter Celebrates 22nd Wedding Anniversary with Husband Ryan by Sharing a Photo from Every Year They've Spent Together
item.description: The pair wed in December 2003, months after they got engaged on 'The Bachelorette'
